EmailTemplate.description: used by getfeedback for ther book program promo survey
EmailTemplate.name: Book Program promo
EmailTemplate.subject: Book Promo Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Book_Project__c.Primary_Contact__c},
The MathWorks Book Program would like to evaluate your book, {!Book_Project__c.Book_Title__c}, for promotion from our Web site. Please complete the following survey to confirm your bookâ€™s publication status and provide us with final information for use in our promotion.
Book Promotional Information
Regards,
MathWorks Book Program Team
(Please do not reply to this email. If you have questions, please contact bookprogram@mathworks.com)
